00046 ChaikinCurveApproximation::ChaikinCurveApproximation() {

00051

00056 
00057 void ChaikinCurveApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out, unsigned int lod) {
00058 #ifdef DEBUG
00059     Stopwatch stopwatch;
00060     stopwatch.start();
00061 #endif
00062     std::vector <FrameWithId> inputCopy;
00063     inputCopy = in;
00064     unsigned int counter = 0;
00065     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < lod; ++i) {
00066         out.clear();
00067         counter += chaikinCurve(inputCopy, out);
00068         inputCopy = out;
00069     }
00070 #ifdef DEBUG  
00071     stopwatch.stop();
00072     LOG("Chaikin curve approximation algorithm:");
00073     LOG("  - input size: %lu", in.size());
00074     LOG("  - level of detail: %d", lod);
00075     LOG("  - output size: %lu", out.size());
00076     LOG("  - iterations : %d", counter);
00077     LOG("  - duration : %f ms", stopwatch.getElapsedTime());
00078 #endif    
00079 }
00080 
00081 void ChaikinCurveApproximation::approximate(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& in, std::vector <FrameWithId>& out) {
00082 
00083     approximate(in, out, 1);
00084 }
00085 
00086 unsigned int ChaikinCurveApproximation::chaikinCurve(const std::vector <FrameWithId>& pointList,
00087         std::vector <FrameWithId>& resultList) {
00088 
00089     if (pointList.size() == 0)
00090         return 0;
00091 
00092     unsigned int counter = 0;
00093     // keep the first point
00094     resultList.push_back(pointList[0]);
00095 
00096     double k = 0.75;
00097     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < (pointList.size() - 1); ++i) {
00098         ++counter;
00099         // get 2 original points
00100         const FrameWithId& p0 = pointList[i];
00101         const FrameWithId& p1 = pointList[i + 1];
00102         FrameWithId Q;
00103         FrameWithId R;
00104 
00105         // average the 2 original points to create 2 new points. For each
00106         // CV, another 2 verts are created.
00107         Q.id = p0.id;
00108         Q.p.x(k * p0.p.x() + (1 - k) * p1.p.x());
00109         Q.p.y(k * p0.p.y() + (1 - k) * p1.p.y());
00110         Q.p.z(k * p0.p.z() + (1 - k) * p1.p.z());
00111 
00112         R.id = p0.id;
00113         R.p.x((1 - k) * p0.p.x() + k * p1.p.x());
00114         R.p.y((1 - k) * p0.p.y() + k * p1.p.y());
00115         R.p.z((1 - k) * p0.p.z() + k * p1.p.z());
00116 
00117         resultList.push_back(Q);
00118         resultList.push_back(R);
00119     }
00120     // keep the last point
00121     resultList.push_back(pointList[pointList.size() - 1]);
00122     return counter;
00123 }
